short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hides synopses in episode carousels and the next episode autoloader of Netflix's web user interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you always try hard ignoring the next episodes synopses for not being spoiled, just enable this extension. An option setting is provided to show the teasers anyway.
